name: TularemiaTestsForFrancisellaTularensisAntibody
title: Tularemia (Tests for Francisella tularensis Antibody)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Francisella tularensis antibody.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Francisella tularensis IgG and total antibody;  

LOINC search: 'Francisella tularensis Ab  -isolateâ€™),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
